PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-00832020-02-29,  ,  ,  ,  NRCAN,  CER
ActNational Energy Board Act
National Energy Board Act Part VI (Oil and Gas) Regulations
SubjectIssuance of Licence GL-343 - Chevron Canada Limited
PrecisOrder approving the ISSUANCE OF LICENCE GL-343 by the Commission of the Canada Energy Regulator to CHEVRON CANADA LIMITED in order to export natural gas from Canada, for a period of 40 years, at the outlet side of the proposed natural gas liquefaction terminal located at Bish Cove, near the town of Kitimat, British Columbia.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
